overview:
Stephen is co-founder of and principal analyst at RedMonk. His areas of coverage there include open source, cloud computing, databases (relational and non-relational), application development and big data. He is RedMonk’s Open Source and Database Lead. His blog is available at http://redmonk.com/sogrady.

Before founding RedMonk, Stephen worked as an industry analyst with Illuminata, coming to that firm from the consulting and systems integration world. With boutique and mid-tier SI’s, Stephen practiced was involved both in technical development and architecture design as well as traditional management consulting.

A longtime blogger, Stephen was named to the News.com Blog 100 in 2006, the Datamation Top 200 the Technobabble 2.0 Top 100 Analyst blogs in 2009 and most recently, the Technobabble 2.0 Top Analyst Twitter list.

He’s been quoted in media outlets as varied as BusinessWweek, the New York Times, NPR and the Wall Street Journal, and regularly works with industry trade press.
